clearGoal.description: Define what you want your audience to learn or do after your presentation

keepSimple.title: Keep it Simple
keepSimple.description: Focus on 3-5 key points maximum to avoid overwhelming your audience

engageAudience.description: Use stories, questions, and interactive elements to keep attention

practice.description: Rehearse multiple times to build confidence and smooth delivery
